Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 22 Ajjhattārammaṇattika » 22.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Ajjhattārammaṇattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
25.
2919Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2920Ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
2921Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo bahiddhārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2922Bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo ajjhattārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
